name: Broken Access Control
description: Access control enforces policy such that users cannot act outside of their intended permissions.
:LABEL: OWASP;Risk

name: Insecure Direct Object References
description: Applications that expose references to internal objects without proper authorization checks.
:LABEL: OWASP;Vulnerability

name: Cryptographic Failures
description: Failures related to cryptography which often lead to exposure of sensitive data.
:LABEL: OWASP;Risk

name: Insecure Transmission
description: Sensitive data transmitted in clear text.
:LABEL: OWASP;Vulnerability
